from: The Brewer short sleeve shirt is crafted from 100% organic cotton for a sustainable and comfortable wear. The oxford weave fabric provides durability, while the slim fit and button-down collar offer a modern and sophisticated look. With the signature gold Farah logo and curved hem, this shirt is a stylish addition to any wardrobe. 100% Organic Cotton Slim Fit Short Sleeve Premium Organic Cotton Woven Oxford Fabrication Button Down Collar Traditional Cut and Sew Button Placket Farah Branded Button Fastenings Curved Hem Embroidered Gold F Model Is 6'2" And Wears Size Medium Machine Wash Shop The Organic Collection Here
